DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the registration of the bispectral index and spectral edge frequency in relation to the behavioural state.
DOC.brief_title: Validation of Bispectral Index (BIS)-Monitor in 3 Groups of Newborn Children
DOC.criteria: Group 1: normal healthy term newborns Group 2: Ill term newborns without brain damage Group 3: Preterm newborns without brain damage Abnormal brain ultrasound Abnormal neurological examination Major congenital abnormalities Use of analgesics, sedatives, antiepileptic drugs or curarisation
